gajakesari_yoga.name: Gaja Kesari Yoga
description: Gaja Kesari Yoga occurs when Jupiter is in a Kendra from the Moon, bestowing wisdom, prosperity and reputation.
It is one of the most auspicious Yogas, indicating intelligence and social influence.

budha_aditya_yoga.name: Budh‑Aditya Yoga
description: Budh‑Aditya Yoga is formed by the conjunction of Mercury and Sun, granting intellectual brilliance and leadership.
It brings success in communication, teaching and public recognition.
